caption.title: Location of this study.
caption.p: The areas marked by light red are the 14 surveillance counties of this study. The black slash and black mesh line represent the cities where the previous hemorrhagic fever with renal syndrome (HFRS) epidemic foci located in Shandong Province. The map was visualized with ArcGIS 10.2 software (ESRI Inc., Redlands, CA, USA).
